definitions: That goes through something; (later especially) passing through, travelling through.
That provides a way or route through; especially designating a street or passageway which is open at both ends, as opposed to a cul-de-sac or dead end.
Of a person: that gets through work quickly or thoroughly; active, energetic; persevering.

Of a person or personal attribute: exemplifying a specified characteristic fully; absolute, extreme, out-and-out. Of an action, process, etc.: involving or dealing with every detail or aspect of something.
